text: Bath is a village in Steuben County, New York, United States. The population was 5,571 at the 2020 census. Bath is the county seat of Steuben County. The Village of Bath is in the Town of Bath and is northwest of Elmira, New York and is west of Tyrone, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * Brief information about Bath, NY * Bath Branch National Home for Disabled Volunteer Soldiers (National Park Service) * Bath National Cemetery * Bath VA Medical Center * Bath & Hammondsport Railroad Category:Villages in New York (state) Category:County seats in New York (state)
title: Bath (village), New York
